mapper.select: select c.status as status, count(*) as count from TB_CALLBACK as c group by c.status;
select c.desc as code, count(*) as count from TB_CALLBACK as c group by c.desc order by FIELD(c.desc, 'Unknown', 'Success') desc;
select IFNULL(c.failback_desc, 'Unknown') as code, count(*) as count from TB_CALLBACK as c where c.code != '0000' group by c.failback_desc order by FIELD(c.failback_desc, 'Success') desc;
SELECT DISTINCT(s.sub_id), s.`comment` FROM TB_CALLBACK AS c, TB_SUB_ID AS s WHERE c.sub_id=s.sub_id;
select c.desc as code, count(*) as count from TB_CALLBACK as c where c.sub_id=#{param} group by c.desc order by FIELD(c.desc, 'Unknown', 'Success') desc;

select IFNULL(c.failback_desc, 'Unknown') as code, count(*) as count from TB_CALLBACK as c where c.code != '0000' and c.sub_id=#{param} group by c.failback_desc order by FIELD(c.failback_desc, 'Success') desc;
